price: ọ̀dájú. Lẹ́yìn ìyẹn, ògbólógbòó ẹni ibi (àsáwọ̀¹, ọmọ zina) ni.
footnotes: 1. Ìyẹn ni pé, kì í ṣe ojúlówó ọmọ ìran Ƙuraeṣ; àsọdọmọ ni. Ẹni náà ni Walīd ọmọ Mugīrah, ẹni tí ó wà ní ọmọ ọdún méjìdínlógún nígbà tí Mugīrah sọ ọ́ di ọmọ rẹ̀.

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.
